replies.body:
Eh, its unlikely. My interest in minecraft has diminished really. Only reason I would come back (to the staff team, that is) is if they desperately needed me or something. I doubt that is going to happen though, so yeah, nah, yeah nah. 

I identify as a tree.

I do not.

Do you? :3 Yey

Still a great show and great fandom but there hasn't been an episode in a while so I guess it'll be pretty monotonous till later this year when they bring it back.

replies.body: Tigers ?Lions ? Or Bears?
replies.body_tagged: Tigers ?Lions ? Or Bears?

replies.body:
For your first question, the most honest answer is that (for personal reasons) I was no longer fit to continue my role as director of staff and admin. So I took a break, thinking I would be able to return in a month or so. That didn't really happen so I ended up getting demoted.

The reason I'm lonely is cause 'I aint got nobody.'

replies.body:
IKR I love it so much, its way too cool. Was even more stoked when I found out the guy who did it is one of my favourite youtube animators and did the rhythm is magic videos.

My surname is Howse. Not sure how 22 came about really. Back in the day my photobucket account was HOWSE22. (Probably from suggested usernames or something) Probably came from that. :P 

I've had a few. And I guess there would be too many now.  For a while now its been the yogscast and there whole family of entertainers. Probably sounds weird,  but I am quite fond of their entertainment style and it inspires me to possible do that sort of thing one day. 

The best dream I've ever had is kinda private and personal so I wont put it on here, sorry. :P
AND NO ITS NOT SEXUAL WHATSOEVER. >:c

replies.body: How did you get to watching MLP? :D
replies.body_tagged: How did you get to watching MLP? :D

replies.body:
Jesus, thats one hell of a question.

Well, it all started around march-april 2013. Essentially by that point I was fully aware that it existed and there was a fan base outside of its demographic, but it never struck me as something worth my time or interest in. I essentially dismissed it really. Never rejected it, just didn't care much for it. 

So one day I found one of the songs from the show. (Winter Wrap Up) Being a fan of cool music and decent animation it was a very big shock to find out that I was actually enjoying it. One thing led to another and I was watching episodes of season 1. By the time I had finished up season 1, I was both incredibly confused and very curious about this new guilty pleasure I had discovered. 

I did the research about the fandom, the show, its background, poured through pages of the  MLP wikia. Essentially what I always do when discovering something new. Eventually I had become enough of a fan to finally become a member of the fandom (and while I'm not a great fan of the name) I essentially became a brony.
replies.body_tagged:
Jesus, thats one hell of a question.

Well, it all started around march-april 2013. Essentially by that point I was fully aware that it existed and there was a fan base outside of its demographic, but it never struck me as something worth my time or interest in. I essentially dismissed it really. Never rejected it, just didn't care much for it. 

So one day I found one of the songs from the show. (Winter Wrap Up) Being a fan of cool music and decent animation it was a very big shock to find out that I was actually enjoying it. One thing led to another and I was watching episodes of season 1. By the time I had finished up season 1, I was both incredibly confused and very curious about this new guilty pleasure I had discovered. 

I did the research about the fandom, the show, its background, poured through pages of the  MLP wikia. Essentially what I always do when discovering something new. Eventually I had become enough of a fan to finally become a member of the fandom (and while I'm not a great fan of the name) I essentially became a brony.
